Rep. Mike Pence , R-Ind., that would deny federal family-planning funds to any organization that performs abortions. Mike Pence makes clear that Planned Parenthood is his target; it would lose more than$ 70 million in annual funding. Every American should be shocked that an employee of the largest recipient of federal funds under Title X has been recorded aiding and abetting underage sex trafficking, Mike Pence said.`` The time to deny any and all funding to Planned Parenthood is now.'' American Idol's season-one co-host Brian Dunkleman admits to having been extremely freaked out the first time he saw Simon Cowell tell someone they should never sing again. It's one thing to watch it on television, but then you spend time with these kids and you have to look at them right in the eyes, and then their mother is looking at you, like,` What just happened?'?
